title: Website Launch
snippet: This is the preliminary CC Berlin website.Comments and suggestions are highly welcome. The previous design can be viewed here: https://ccberlin.github.io/Points to discuss:  Should we add some soci...
content: This is the preliminary CC Berlin website.Comments and suggestions are highly welcome. The previous design can be viewed here: https://ccberlin.github.io/Points to discuss:  Should we add some social media/contacts to the website? There is an option to do so in the lower left corner.  Do we have a logo we would like to use?
